Traits.name: Quick Favor
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.WrathGauge} charges up automatically.

Traits.name: Side Hustle
Traits.description: Each time you enter a {$Keywords.RoomAlt}, gain a bit of wealth.

Traits.name: Auto Reload
Traits.description: You regenerate {!Icons.Ammo} faster.

Traits.name: Second Wind
Traits.description: After using {$Keywords.Wrath}, gain {$Keywords.Dodge} chance and move speed for {#BoldFormatGraft}{$TooltipData.TooltipDuration} Sec.{#PreviousFormat}

Traits.name: Swift Strike
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.Attack} is faster.

Traits.name: Swift Flourish
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.Special} is faster.

Traits.name: Quick Recovery
Traits.description: After taking damage, quickly {$Keywords.Dash} to recover some {!Icons.Health_Small_Tooltip} you just lost.

Traits.name: Greater Haste
Traits.description: You move faster.

Traits.name: Hyper Sprint
Traits.description: After you {$Keywords.Dash}, briefly become {$Keywords.Sturdy} and move {#BoldFormatGraft}{$TooltipData.TooltipSpeedBoost:P} {#PreviousFormat} faster.

Traits.name: Flurry Cast
Traits.description: Hold {$Keywords.Cast} to fire in rapid succession.

Traits.name: Greatest Reflex
Traits.description: You can {$Keywords.Dash} more times in a row.

Traits.name: Greater Evasion
Traits.description: Whenever you are hit, you have a chance to {$Keywords.Dodge} automatically.

Traits.name: Quick Reload
Traits.description: Foes drop {!Icons.Ammo} stuck in them faster.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Bad News
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.Cast} deals bonus damage to foes {#ItalicFormat}without {#PreviousFormat}{!Icons.Ammo} in them.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Rush Delivery
LinkedUpgrades.description: You deal bonus damage based on any bonus move speed.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Greater Recall
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {!Icons.Ammo} return to you automatically.

Traits.name: Heartbreak Strike
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.Attack} deals more damage and inflicts {$Keywords.Weak}.

Traits.name: Passion Dash
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.Dash} deals damage where you end up, inflicting {$Keywords.Weak}.

Traits.name: Crush Shot
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.Cast} is a wide, short-range blast that inflicts {$Keywords.Weak}.

Traits.name: Heartbreak Flourish
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.Special} deals more damage and inflicts {$Keywords.Weak}.

Traits.name: Aphrodite's Aid
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.WrathDerivedStocks} fires a seeking projectile that inflicts {$Keywords.Charm}.

Traits.name: Passion Flare
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.Cast} damages foes around you and inflicts {$Keywords.Weak}.

Traits.name: Wave of Despair
Traits.description: After you take damage, damage foes around you and inflict {$Keywords.Weak}.

Traits.name: Dying Lament
Traits.description: When foes are slain, they damage nearby foes and inflict {$Keywords.Weak}.

Traits.name: Different League
Traits.description: Resist some damage from nearby foes' attacks.

Traits.name: Life Affirmation
Traits.description: Any {!Icons.HealthUp_Small} chamber rewards are worth more.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Sweet Nectar
LinkedUpgrades.description: Any {$Keywords.PomPlural} you find are more potent.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Empty Inside
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.Weak} effects have a longer duration.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Sweet Surrender
LinkedUpgrades.description: {$Keywords.Weak}-afflicted foes are also more susceptible to damage.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Blown Kiss
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.Cast} shoots farther and is stronger against undamaged foes.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Heart Rend
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.Crit} effects deal even more damage to {$Keywords.Weak} foes.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Low Tolerance
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.Poison} effects can stack more times against {$Keywords.Weak} foes.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Parting Shot
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.Cast} gains any bonuses you have for striking foes from behind.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Curse of Longing
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.Curse} effects continuously strike {$Keywords.Weak} foes.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Smoldering Air
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.WrathGauge} charges up automatically, but is capped at {#AltPenaltyFormat}25%{#PreviousFormat}.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Cold Embrace
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.Cast} crystal fires its beam directly at you for {#BoldFormatGraft}+{$TooltipData.TooltipDuration} Sec{#PreviousFormat}.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Unhealthy Fixation
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.Weak} effects also have a {#BoldFormat}{$TooltipData.TooltipAffectChance:P} {#PreviousFormat}chance to {$Keywords.Charm} foes.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Broken Resolve
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.Weak} effects are more potent.

Traits.name: Curse of Agony
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.Attack} inflicts {$Keywords.Curse}.

Traits.name: Blade Dash
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.Dash} creates a {$Keywords.BladeRift} where you started.

Traits.name: Slicing Shot
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.Cast} sends a {$Keywords.BladeRift} hurtling ahead.

Traits.name: Curse of Pain
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.Special} inflicts {$Keywords.Curse}.

Traits.name: Ares' Aid
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.WrathDerivedStocks} turns you into an {$Keywords.Invulnerable} {$Keywords.BladeRift} for {#BoldFormat}{$TooltipData.AddShout.SuperDuration} Sec{#PreviousFormat}.

Traits.name: Slicing Flare
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.Cast} sends a large {$Keywords.BladeRift} hurtling ahead for a brief time.

Traits.name: Curse of Vengeance
Traits.description: After you take damage, inflict {$Keywords.Curse} on foes around you.

Traits.name: Urge to Kill
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.Attack}, {$Keywords.Special}, and {$Keywords.Cast} deal more damage.

Traits.name: Battle Rage
Traits.description: After slaying a foe, your next {$Keywords.Attack} or {$Keywords.Special} deals more damage.

Traits.name: Blood Frenzy
Traits.description: After using {$Keywords.ExtraChance}, deal more damage that {$Keywords.EncounterAlt}.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Hunting Blades
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.Cast} creates a faster {$Keywords.BladeRift} that seeks the nearest foe.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Freezing Vortex
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.Cast} inflicts {$Keywords.Chill}, but is smaller and moves slower.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Curse of Drowning
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {#BoldFormatGraft}Flood Shot {#PreviousFormat}becomes a pulse that damages foes around you.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Dire Misfortune
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.Curse} effects deal more damage when applied multiple times.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Impending Doom
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.Curse} effects deal more damage, but take {#BoldFormatGraft}+{$TooltipData.TooltipDelay} Sec. {#PreviousFormat}to activate.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Merciful End
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your abilities that can {$Keywords.Deflect} immediately activate {$Keywords.Curse} effects.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Vicious Cycle
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.BladeRift} effects deal more damage for each consecutive hit.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Curse of Nausea
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.Poison} effects deal damage faster.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Vengeful Mood
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.Revenge} effects sometimes occur without taking damage.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Black Metal
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.BladeRift} effects deal damage in a wider area.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Engulfing Vortex
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.BladeRift} effects last longer and pull foes in.

Traits.name: Frost Strike
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.Attack} is stronger and inflicts {$Keywords.Chill}.

Traits.name: Frost Flourish
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.Special} is stronger and inflicts {$Keywords.Chill}.

Traits.name: Mistral Dash
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.Dash} shoots a gust ahead that inflicts {$Keywords.Chill}.

Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.Cast} drops a crystal that fires a beam at foes for {#BoldFormatGraft}{$TooltipData.TooltipDuration} Sec{#PreviousFormat}.

Traits.name: Icy Flare
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.Cast} damages foes around you and inflicts {$Keywords.Chill}.

Traits.name: Demeter's Aid
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.WrathDerivedStocks} creates a winter vortex that grows over {#BoldFormat}{$TooltipData.AddShout.SuperDuration} Sec{#PreviousFormat}., inflicting {$Keywords.Chill}.

Traits.name: Snow Burst
Traits.description: Whenever you {$Keywords.Cast}, damage foes around you and inflict {$Keywords.Chill}.

Traits.name: Ravenous Will
Traits.description: When you have no {!Icons.Ammo}, take {#BoldFormat}{$TooltipData.TooltipDefense}% {#PreviousFormat}less damage and deal more.

Traits.name: Frozen Touch
Traits.description: After you take damage, damage and {#ItalicFormat}completely {#PreviousFormat}{$Keywords.Chill} your foe.

Traits.name: Nourished Soul
Traits.description: Any {!Icons.HealthRestore_Small_Tooltip} effects are more potent. Restore {$TooltipData.NewTotal1}{!Icons.Health_Small} now.

Traits.name: Rare Crop
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.GodBoonPlural} become {$Keywords.Common}, then gain {$Keywords.Rarity} every {#BoldFormat}{$TooltipData.TooltipRoomInterval} {#PreviousFormat} {$Keywords.Encounter}.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Arctic Blast
LinkedUpgrades.description: Applying {#BoldFormat}{$TooltipData.TooltipChillStacks} {#PreviousFormat}stacks of {$Keywords.Chill} causes a blast, clearing the effect.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Glacial Glare
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.Cast} fires longer and inflicts {$Keywords.Chill}.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Cold Fusion
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.Static} effects do not expire when foes attack.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Ice Wine
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.Cast} blasts an area with freezing {$Keywords.Cloud} that inflicts {$Keywords.Chill}.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Winter Harvest

LinkedUpgrades.name: Blizzard Shot
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.Cast} moves slowly, piercing foes and firing shards around it.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Stubborn Roots
LinkedUpgrades.description: If you have no {$Keywords.ExtraChance}, your {!Icons.Health_Small_Tooltip} slowly recovers.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Crystal Clarity
LinkedUpgrades.description: Your {$Keywords.Cast} is stronger and tracks foes more effectively.

LinkedUpgrades.name: Killing Freeze

Traits.name: Drunken Strike
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.Attack} inflicts {$Keywords.Poison}.

Traits.name: Drunken Dash

Traits.name: Dionysus' Aid

Traits.name: After Party

Traits.name: Positive Outlook

Traits.name: Strong Drink

LinkedUpgrades.name: Numbing Sensation

LinkedUpgrades.name: High Tolerance

LinkedUpgrades.name: Peer Pressure

LinkedUpgrades.name: Exclusive Access

LinkedUpgrades.name: Splitting Headache

LinkedUpgrades.name: Calculated Risk

LinkedUpgrades.name: Black Out

LinkedUpgrades.name: Scintillating Feast

LinkedUpgrades.name: Bad Influence

Traits.name: Tempest Strike
Traits.description: Your {$Keywords.Attack} deals more damage and knocks foes away.

Traits.name: Boiling Point
